message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses the use of text mining tools for information retrieval and extraction, which is a common topic in the fields of information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and databases (cs.DB). The focus on semantic text annotation and the use of multiple knowledge sources suggests a stronger connection to cs.CL and cs.AI, but the application of these tools to cope with the increasing amount of written material also relates to cs.IR.
